title: Ticket #6756: Python test framework improvements
description:
• Rename CondorJob to CondorCluster, which better reflect reality.
  • Change CondorTest from cleaning up personal condors when destroyed to cleaning them up via an atexit handler. This cleans up the person condor in more cases.
  • Split personal condor clean up into two phases so that we can wait for more than one personal condor to shut down simultaneously (and so, in the atexit handler).
  • Make CondorTest a static class to prevent test writers from making more than one.
  • Trap sys.exit so that the CondorTest atexit handler can also alter the exit code if necessary (e.g., a registered test failed).
  • Generally carry the personal condor's schedd around with us. This should make tests with multiple personal condors much less painful.
  • Add event memory to CondorCluster.
